General.Name: Wuxi Paike New Materials Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuxi Paike New Materials Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of metal forgings in China and internationally. The company's primary products include ring forgings, free forgings, precision die forgings, etc. It also offers carbon steel, alloy steel, stainless steel, high-temperature alloys, aluminum alloys, titanium alloys, and magnesium alloys. The company's products are used in aviation, aerospace, petrochemical, energy, power, marine, mechanical, and other industries. Wuxi Paike New Materials Technology Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Wuxi, China.
